summary: A story centered on a company that grants wishes to people looking for a day away from their ordinary lives.
cast: Baihe Bai|Nathaniel Boyd|Bingkun Cao|Jackie Chan|Scotty Bob Cox|Wei Fan|You Ge|Xiaotong Guan|Chengru Li|Xiaolu Li|Yong Li|Tian Liang|Pu Miao|Angela Qiu|Dandan Song|Baoqiang Wang|Ryan Zheng
title: Si ren ding zhi
